attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: Whenever I use the app, I get the worst luck ever! My imaginary fish named Arwin ran away, and then I tripped running after him. Oh and not to mention I spilled mustard on myself while eating my bagel, and that stuff stains!

attributes.title: just no
attributes.review: i am actually a trump supporter but this is horrible i hate it so much. it just makes absolutely NO sense. please for the sake of our eyes just take this app down.

attributes.title: Cell phone crash
attributes.review: This app made my cell phone crash more than my brain. DONT GET IT! If I could give it less than 1 star I would! Solid 0/5

attributes.title: Not good
attributes.review: It took hours to download but when it did, it caused allllllllll my other apps to crash. 0/10.  Would not recommend

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: I wanted to support my favorite president ever but as soon as I opened the app the devil spawned in my room and took my soul, then the app deleted itself from my phone. Now I have no soul and no trump 2020 app 😭

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: this app is overall the worst app in the app store. I can say that using this app gave me no benefits what so ever and i am ashamed i downloaded this. 2020 will be down in history.

attributes.title: This app is so bad
attributes.review: So I download this app and it made my phone glitch and my phone is so bad to the point that I can get on it uuuuuuu I dislike this app so much and I can say what I wanna say periedt.....😡😤🥶😔😖😟🥺

attributes.title: no no no
attributes.review: downloaded this app to be a part of Keep America Great Campaign Trump for President 2020 🇺🇸, but this app is so glitchy, offensive, misleading, confusing, and the in app purchases are awful and not worth the money! ☹️

attributes.title: no
attributes.userName: idrk what to put so here
attributes.review: i have never downloaded a worse app. i hate seeing “trump” across my phone. but baby boy how does it feel when YOUR app is abt to delete🥺

attributes.title: Hacked my phone
attributes.review: This should get deleted right away they could be giving information to China
